item.title: 3 Features Distributed Systems Have In Common
item.description: Imagine things are on fire and you only have a few minutes to figure out a distributed system. To make things more difficult, you’ve never seen this system before. You feel yourself tensing up - sweaty palms, cloudy mind - and you think, gosh I just wish I knew where to start! In this post, hopefully I can help you if you’re in this scenario! ðŸ˜„ Here are 3 features commonly found in most distributed systems you can use to speed debug so that you don’t have to feel lost trying to understand all the details.
